entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Test Plan for "Inline Arrays" feature #67826
  • Raw multiline string literal doesn't show indentation line if closing """ isn't in viewport #67821
    Backlog
  • Very small subset of violations\rules are reported by roslyn after migration from *.ruleset files to GlobalAnalyzerConfigFiles and rditorconfig type files #67820
  • NRE in NullableWalker while editing code #67816

Closed

  • Generic Attribute not possible when passing on generic type #67569
    17.7
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33613.491 #67814

PullRequests

Created

  • Add support for parameter-less LSP requests #67829
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Cache the names of assembly symbols for PEReferences #67828
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Move to non-segmented dictionary #67825
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Do not allocate Location[]s for source methods #67823
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Use proper type for `BoundAwaitOperator` in VB statement #67822
    Language-VB, Area-Compilers, Feature - IOperation, 17.7
  • Semantic snippets: Add inline statement snippets #67819
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Add FilterSpan API to analyzer contexts #67818
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged

Merged

  • Switch to TemporaryArrays while topologically sorting graphs #67780
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Move off of the final usage of an uncached AsyncLazy #65780
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add "Inline Arrays" feature to "Language Feature Status.md" #67827
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays, Next
  • Include matched spans in our 'container' pattern matcher #67813
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Defer creation of Location objects to the point they are actually needed. #67742
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Fix server crash if inlay hint entry not in cache #67810
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Round-trip extensions via metadata #67530
    Area-Compilers, C# 12.0
  • Correct generate rename code action in LSP #67731
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Avoid allocating delegates when formatting trees. #67812
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Reduce allocations of StateForCase instances. #67778
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Generate branchless IL for `(b ? 1 : 0)` #67191
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge release/dev17.6-vs-deps to main #67762
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Have AsyncLazy always cache values #67207
    Area-IDE
  • Fixed CA1854: Prefer IDictionary.TryGetValue(TKey, out TValue) occurrences #66515
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, Community
  • WIP: Not for review - Merged branch of all perf work. #67730
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Don't look to the global.json when we're loading a binlog #67483
    Area-IDE
  • Revert "Use dictionary lookup while resolving assembly references (#6… #67808
    Area-Compilers, Regression, untriaged
  • Consider ref property and indexer accesses to have home #67736
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Pool node collections in analyzer driver. #67776
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Avoid realizing locations array when finding the symbol found in a particular location. #67691
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Pool intermediary dictionaries use to create named type and namespace members #67727
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Pool 'boxed' helper objects used during constraints checking #67724
    Area-Compilers
  • New contracts #67811
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Initial pass at enabling prebuilt detection #67645
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • More source build work #67809
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Deprecate CompilationWithAnalyzers.IsDiagnosticAnalyzerSuppressed public API #67671
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Update `nameof` feature status #67794
    Area-Compilers, Documentation
